title: Balduvian Hydra
text: Balduvian Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+0 counters on it.Remove a +1/+0 counter from Balduvian Hydra: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to Balduvian Hydra this turn.: Put a +1/+0 counter on Balduvian Hydra. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.
